history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER CMU
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to carnegie-mellon university?
USER So no, I want to go to airport.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to pittsburgh international airport?
USER No, I want to go to Shady Side.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to shadyside?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER from CMU
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from carnegie-mellon university?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER And night at 7.
TTS Okay, travelling at 09:49 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No, leave at 10 p.m.
TTS Okay, travelling at 10:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 18 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 8 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue at Morewood avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 71D <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue opposite College St.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 10:13pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Okay.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 6 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Shadyside, Pittsburgh, PA, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Becks
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No.
